meta.job_title: GIS Technology Analyst / Land Technology Analyst

duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement and support technology solutions for Client Land Department
Enhance and support the Land Information Management System (LIMS)
Provide first-line support for client server, web, and mobile applications
Utilize responsive web application programming to enhance technology solutions
Analyze data through complex queries and build custom dashboard reports and documents
Coordinate multiple business unit requests and ensure goals and objectives are met

education_certification.credential: Four-year degree in Management Information Systems, Management, Computer Information Systems, Computer Science, Forestry, or other Land or Technology related field of study
